item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded:
GOVERNMENT SERVICES

COMMERCIAL SERVICES

OVERVIEW

Your Information Technology [IT] is the heart of your company’s ability to conduct business effectively and consistently with your customers. At ARISTA, our goal is to provide solutions with personalized high-touch services. Is your IT flexible, resilient and sustainable? We bring years of experience in consultative, design, implementation, support and troubleshooting to your organization. ARISTA can fill in the gaps in knowledge and experience needed to complete crucial projects and fix problem areas for your company. Our clients include companies of all sizes from small startups to Fortune 500.

Today’s ever changing technology environments demand increasing expertise. We are industry experts. Our team strives to understand your requirements and how they impact your business and your company’s ability to communicate.

The ARISTA onsite team provides a level of care not often seen in this industry. We truly stand by you through every step and every hour. No other company will provide you with this dedication to service. We have been designing and implementing solutions since the mid-1990s. Our clients receive individual attention making sure even the smallest of details is considered. We provide Cisco, Microsoft, General IT and Project Management certified team members.

At ARISTA Enterprises, We can help you improve the return on your investment with upfront design services. We also offer training and support services or can work with your own staff. We specialize in post installation support, “leaving no one behind”.

Years of equipment purchased can be leveraged towards your future business goals. We can help extend the life cycle of your existing equipment using industry best practices. Let our experience and knowledge work for you.

CONTACT US

Reach out to us today and get started making your IT life easier!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://localhost/wordpress.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Industries
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded: At Arista Enterprises, we are uniquely positioned to solve all your government and commercial IT needs. We have the staff, training and ability to draft a solid plan and then execute that plan. At Arista we can envision and design solutions to fit any customer needs and wants.

item.title: GOVERNMENT SERVICES
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT US

The ARISTA onsite team provides a level of care not often seen in this industry. We truly stand by you through every step. No other company will provide you with this dedication to service. We have been designing and implementing solutions since the mid1990s. Our clients receive individual attention making sure even the smallest of details is considered. We provide Cisco, Microsoft, General IT and Project Management certified team members. Let our experience and knowledge work for you.

PREVIOUS HISTORY

Borough of Edgewater – Unified Communications, security and netowrk infrastructure design and implementation across multiple sites.

Mindray – Unified Communications, network, new data center, server virtualization design and implementation

Lithia Motors – Data Center and Unified  Communications desing and implementation

CORE COMPETENCIES
  • Design and Architecture
  • Professional Project Management
  • Cabling Plant Infrastructure
  • Network: Switches & Routers
  • Security: Assessments
  • Security: Firewalls (Cisco, Fortinet & Sonicwall)
  • Custom Programming and Application Development
  • Wireless: Indoor & Outdoor
  • Cisco Unified Communications
  • Network & Application Performance Analysis
  • Cloud and Virtualization: VMWare/HyperV
  • Server & Desktop: Linux/Microsoft
  • Business Applications: MS Office Products / CRM & Other Applications

COMPANY SNAPSHOT

Linwood, NJ 08221

Phone: 833-474-8884 option 2

item.title: COMMERCIAL SERVICES
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded:
CORE COMPETENCIES

  • Design and Architecture
  • Professional Project Management
  • Cabling Plant Infrastructure
  • Network: Switches & Routers
  • Security: Assessments
  • Security: Firewalls (Cisco, Fortinet & Sonicwall)
  • Custom Programming and Application Development
  • Wireless: Indoor & Outdoor
  • Cisco Unified Communications
  • Network & Application Performance Analysis
  • Cloud and Virtualization: VMWare/HyperV
  • Server & Desktop: Linux/Microsoft
  • Business Applications: MS Office Products / CRM & Other Applications

INDUSTRY FOCUS

  • Corporate/Retail
  • Construction
  • Education
  • Healthcare
  • Manufacturing
  • Auto Industry
  • Legal
  • Real Estate
  • Financial

COMPLETE SERVICE

After your system has been installed, Arista Enterprises can provide you with the end user training in order to benfit fully from this new technology. In addition, we can be contracted to provide assistance and ongoing support to your new system.

ABOUT US

At ARISTA Enterprises, we have worked with small companies to fortune 500 companies in order to install high quality IT systems. We have a highly skilled onsite team that can take you through each step of the process. ARISTA is able to present a buisness case, project plans, engineering drawings and a statement of work to your company. In addition, break down exactly how the system will work for you. We work with many instustries and at ARISTA we are able to install exactly what you want on-time and within the budget.

NEXT STEPS...

To begin the process of getting your system installed, contact us today!

item.title: ABOUT ARISTA ENTERPRISES
item.dc:creator: arista
item.content:encoded: At Arista Enterprises we are leaders in providing strategic solutions and assisting clients with their IT problems. We are able to harness technology and provide innovative solutions in order to best suit the current situation and problem. Since the mid 1990's we have been designing and implementing world-class IT solutions. Every client receives individual attention and support through every step of the process and each hour at a time. We have worked with companies ranging from small to fortune 500 sized companies and are able each time to provide an unmatched quality of service. Arista can provide Cisco, Microsoft and General IT certifed team members to assist you with any problems your company has. Allow Arista Enterprises Expertise to work for you.
